column2: Indicates whether thetimings incorporateRT3973 speedrestrictions
column4: Indicates whetherthe train is singleor double headed
column5: Trailing weight inhundreds oftonnes with finaltwo figuresomitted. (i.e. 12indicates a weightbetween 1200 and1299)

column2: B = Both (i.e. a HeavyAxle Weight Containertrain)C = ContainerH = Heavy Axle weighttrain- = Standard SRTs
column4: S = Single headedD = Doubleheaded
column5: For less than 1000tonnes a leadingzero is used i.e. 08indicates 800 -899 tonnes

column2: Indicates whetherthe timingsincorporateRT3973 speedrestrictions
column5: Trailing weight - upperlimit of a two hundredtonne band (i.e. 12indicates a weightbetween 1001 and 1200tonnes)

column2: - = No RT3973C=ContainerH=Heavy AxleWeightB=Both (i.e. aHeavy Axle WeightContainer train)
column4: S = Single HeadedD = Double Headed
